thread.title: Quartet Urges Israelis, Palestinians to De-Escalate Tensions
thread.title_full: Quartet Urges Israelis, Palestinians to De-Escalate Tensions - WSJ

author: Valentina Pop
title: Quartet Urges Israelis, Palestinians to De-Escalate Tensions
text:
VIENNA—The U.S., European Union, Russia and the United Nations on Friday urged Israelis and Palestinians to de-escalate tensions, as violence has reignited in the past month after Israel restricted access for Muslim worshipers to a holy site in Jerusalem.
Israel’s military on Friday said Israeli troops shot a Palestinian after he stabbed a soldier near the Jewish settlement of Gush Etzion, south of Jerusalem.
